title: When is it a good idea to pick Syndra now?
body: Because I picked her against things she used to counter, won lane, but did rather poorly late. Last game I picked her into Ahri, and everything was fine until late game and I just simply didn't do as much damage as she did. Didn't contribute much at all to the team fights because my stun was acting up, too. The only game in which I did exceptionally well against someone, as of late, as Syndra was when I played against a Viktor.
